name: Alcatraz Prison Escape 3D Gangstar Pixel Break-out
name_original: Alcatraz Prison Escape 3D Gangstar Pixel Break-out
description: Pixel prison break version of the popular pixel prison escape game. The prison life is hard, even for the gangster city vegas and rio drug and gun game lord. How did this mafia city gangstar vegas gun builder end up as a prison builder of stones? well.. nobody dares to ask. Only thing on his mind now is revenge on the cops & robbers who put him here and his escape the prison plans. As a X hit man sniper shooter and sniper assassin elite he knows he must kill for survival. In Alcatraz prison, he must escape the room one at a time and find the keys. Third person game with a fps shooter control. Many cool pixel gun and melee pixel strike weapons to unlock. go be free!
